name: Pleasant Parkour
description:
So i decided to create a Fortnite deathrun in 2d.

The game contains traps, difficult jumps, impulse grenades, grapplers etc.

This version of the game is still a little demo of what the finished game will look's like !

You can expect more than 50 levels, improved graphics, sounds, a level editor etc in the future.

If you want to be part of the project, i'm currently looking for any help, including level creator, 2d artist, programmer, sound designer...
No programming knowledge or professional experience is required, this is a hobby project and we are here to improve and have fun :)

Contact me at steven.clain27@gmail.com
I will create a Discord soon if needed.

This game will often be updated, so don't hesitate to follow my page.
Also, any suggestion and feedback is really appreciated.

I will try to publish a MacOS and Linux version soon.
